rules.description: This model can never be targeted or affected by psychic powers in any way. In addition, enemy PSYKERS must subtract 1 from Psychic tests and Deny the witch tests they take for each unit with this ability that is within 18" of them (to a maximum of -4). Note, however, that this ability has no effect whilst the unit is embarked in a TRANSPORT.
rules.name: Psychic Abomination
